member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_TYPE
member.summary: Describes whether a render target uses hardware or software rendering, or if Direct2D should select the rendering mode.

member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_TYPE.D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_TYPE_DEFAULT
member.summary: The render target uses hardware rendering, if available; otherwise, it uses software rendering.

member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_TYPE.D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_TYPE_SOFTWARE
member.summary: The render target uses software rendering only.

member.name: D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_TYPE.D2D1_RENDER_TARGET_TYPE_HARDWARE
member.summary: The render target uses hardware rendering only.
